revisions.rev:
{{NCAATeamSeason | Year = 2004 | Team = Pittsburgh Panthers | Mode = football | Image = PittPanthers.png | ImageSize = | Conference = Big East | ShortConference = | Division = | CoachRank = | APRank = 25 | Record = 8-4 | ConfRecord = 4-2 | HeadCoach = [[Walt Harris]] | OffCoach = [[Walt Harris]] | DefCoach = [[Paul Rhoads]] | OScheme = | DScheme = | StadiumArena = [[Heinz Field]] | Champion = Big East Co-Champions | BowlTourney = {{alternate links|2005 Fiesta Bowl|Fiesta Bowl|title=Fiesta Bowl}} | BowlTourneyResult = Loss, 7-35, [[2004 Utah Utes football team|Utah Utes]] }} {{2004 Big East football standings}} The '''2004 Pittsburgh Panthers football team''' represented the [[University of Pittsburgh]] in the 2004 college football season in which they won a share of The [[Big East Conference]] Championship and were awarded with a [[Bowl Championship Series|BCS]] berth to the [[2005 Fiesta Bowl]].
